item.title: Debugging in Chrome
item.description: How to debug in chrome? Most obvious answer will be console.log. But writing console.log all over the places can get messy. But there are some easy ways to do that. Live Expression Open DevTools > Go to console tab > click on eye like symbol Type expressin that you wanna watch. This expression will be maintained for all the site you visit. Instead of flooding your console it will show the live value.
